scripts.build:android:preview:old: cd android && NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=false ./gradlew assembleRelease && mkdir -p ../builds/preview-old && mv app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk ../builds/preview-old/android.apk
scripts.build:android:preview:new: cd android && NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=true ./gradlew assembleRelease && mkdir -p ../builds/preview-new && mv app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk ../builds/preview-new/android.apk
scripts.build:android:development:old: cd android && NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=false ./gradlew assembleDebug && mkdir -p ../builds/development-old && mv app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk ../builds/development-old/android.apk
scripts.build:android:development:new: cd android && NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=true ./gradlew assembleDebug && mkdir -p ../builds/development-new && mv app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk ../builds/development-new/android.apk
scripts.build:ios:preview:old: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 pod install && xcodebuild -workspace SherloRNExample.xcworkspace -derivedDataPath app -configuration Release -scheme SherloRNExample -destination="generic/platform=iOS Simulator" -sdk iphonesimulator && mkdir -p ../builds/preview-old && tar -czf ../builds/preview-old/ios.tar.gz -C app/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator SherloRNExample.app
scripts.build:ios:preview:new: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod install && xcodebuild -workspace SherloRNExample.xcworkspace -derivedDataPath app -configuration Release -scheme SherloRNExample -destination="generic/platform=iOS Simulator" -sdk iphonesimulator && mkdir -p ../builds/preview-new && tar -czf ../builds/preview-new/ios.tar.gz -C app/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator SherloRNExample.app
scripts.build:ios:development:old: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 pod install && xcodebuild -workspace SherloRNExample.xcworkspace -derivedDataPath app -configuration Debug -scheme SherloRNExample -destination="generic/platform=iOS Simulator" -sdk iphonesimulator && mkdir -p ../builds/development-old && tar -czf ../builds/development-old/ios.tar.gz -C app/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator SherloRNExample.app
scripts.build:ios:development:new: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod install && xcodebuild -workspace SherloRNExample.xcworkspace -derivedDataPath app -configuration Debug -scheme SherloRNExample -destination="generic/platform=iOS Simulator" -sdk iphonesimulator && mkdir -p ../builds/development-new && tar -czf ../builds/development-new/ios.tar.gz -C app/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator SherloRNExample.app
scripts.install:ios:preview:old: tar -xzvf builds/preview-old/ios.tar.gz -C builds/preview-old && xcrun simctl install booted builds/preview-old/SherloRNExample.app
scripts.install:ios:preview:new: tar -xzvf builds/preview-new/ios.tar.gz -C builds/preview-new && xcrun simctl install booted builds/preview-new/SherloRNExample.app
scripts.install:ios:development:old: tar -xzvf builds/development-old/ios.tar.gz -C builds/development-old && xcrun simctl install booted builds/development-old/SherloRNExample.app
scripts.install:ios:development:new: tar -xzvf builds/development-new/ios.tar.gz -C builds/development-new && xcrun simctl install booted builds/development-new/SherloRNExample.app
